specialRules.hint: The hero and his unit get the Furious special rule.
specialRules.name: Battle Drills
specialRules.label: Battle Drills
specialRules.description: The hero and his unit get the Furious special rule.

specialRules.hint: When the hero and his unit are activated pick one of the following orders, and they get one of these special rules until the end of the round:  Double Time: +3” when moving  Take Aim: +1 to shooting rolls  Focus Fire: AP(+1) when shooting  Fix Bayonets: +1 to melee rolls Company Standard: This unit gets the Fear and Fearless special rules.
specialRules.name: Commander
specialRules.label: Commander
specialRules.description: When the hero and his unit are activated pick one of the following orders, and they get one of these special rules until the end of the round:  Double Time: +3” when moving  Take Aim: +1 to shooting rolls  Focus Fire: AP(+1) when shooting  Fix Bayonets: +1 to melee rolls Company Standard: This unit gets the Fear and Fearless special rules.

specialRules.hint: Whenever the hero’s unit fails a morale test you must kill one of its models and the morale test counts as passed instead.
specialRules.name: Executioner
specialRules.label: Executioner
specialRules.description: Whenever the hero’s unit fails a morale test you must kill one of its models and the morale test counts as passed instead.

specialRules.hint: If this unit has a Commander, then it may give orders to other units that have a Field Radio up to 24” away instead of to his own unit.
specialRules.name: Field Radio
specialRules.label: Field Radio
specialRules.description: If this unit has a Commander, then it may give orders to other units that have a Field Radio up to 24” away instead of to his own unit.

specialRules.hint: This model and his unit get the Regeneration rule.
specialRules.name: Medical Training
specialRules.label: Medical Training
specialRules.description: This model and his unit get the Regeneration rule.

spells.name: Foresight
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets +1 to hit next time it shoots.

spells.name: Flame Breath
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 2 automatic hits with AP(2).

spells.name: Protective Dome
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets Regeneration next time it takes wounds.

spells.name: Expel
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 1 automatic hit with AP(4) and Deadly(3).

spells.name: Psychic Speed
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” may immediately move by up to 6”.

spells.name: Tempest
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 6” takes 1 automatic hit per model.
